Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits the sale of juvenile products, mattresses and upholstered furniture containing fiberglass
Summary: Prohibits the sale of juvenile products, mattresses and upholstered furniture containing fiberglass; defines juvenile product; prohibits custom upholsterers from repairing or restoring any juvenile product, mattress or furniture with parts that contain fiberglass.
LawCode: Add ยง399-iii, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of juvenile products, mattresses and upholstered furniture containing fiberglass
